WENN Celebrity

The power couple attended a private fashion event together and looked very happy despite recent divorce rumors.

Jun 11, 2018

AceShowbiz - On Sunday, 10 June, former soccer player David Beckham and his wife Victoria Adams a.k.a. Victoria Beckham were in attendance at the Kent and Curwen spring/summer 2019 private capsule collection fashion show in London. The couple looked happy as they're smiling and showing PDA, proving the recent divorce rumors were wrong.

The Posh Spice took to Instagram to share their PDA pictures. The first picture sees Victoria posing with British Vogue editor-in-chief Edward Enninful and Dior Homme artistic director Kim Jones. Her husband joins the photo session by standing behind them with one of his hands on Victoria's left shoulder. Victoria, meanwhile, sees the opportunity to hold her husband's hand and taking it.

"So proud of @davidbeckham @daniel.kearns @kentandcurwen X beautiful collection x kisses @edward_enninful @mrkimjones VB," she proudly mentioned her husband who has been appointed as ambassadorial president of the British Fashion Council. Victoria wore a white striped kaftan dress from her pre autumn/winter 2018 collection, while David donned Kent & Curwen from head to toe.

Katrina Israel, Fashion Features Director of Evening Standard magazine, captured the PDA moment of the couple from different angle and posted it on Instagram. The Spice Girls member then reposted it on her own account with a cute heart emoji on the caption. "#momentcaptured," she described the picture of herself still holding David's hand.

#momentcaptured ❤ 📷 @katrinaisrael A post shared by Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) on Jun 10, 2018 at 8:02am PDT

According to The Guardian, Victoria and David arrived separately, even though they stayed together. During lunch, they sat next to either side of Edward Enninful and ate deconstructed fish and chips. They reportedly held hands and appeared relax as they posed for the photographers in attendance.

After the show, David stated that he was not only pleased with the collection, but also its collaboration with indie band The Stone Roses. The soccer star said that he was a huge fan of the band and his favorite song was "I Am the Resurrection".
